firmware.source:
while True:
	try:
		t = UTC.getTime()
	except Exception as e:
		print(e)
	equests.Response.close
		gc.collect()
		sta_if.disconnect()
		time.sleep(1)
		sta_if.connect(ssid_, wp2_pass)
		pass
	else:
		oled.fill(0)
		oled.show()
		oled.text('Gio:  '+ t['hour'], 0 ,0)
		oled.text('Phut:  '+ t['minute'], 0 ,10)
		oled.text('Giay:  '+ t['second'], 0 ,20)
		oled.show()
	time.sleep(5)
